scripts.build: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:systems
scripts.build:systems: cd packages/system-01 && pnpm run build && cd ../system-02 && pnpm run build
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:systems
scripts.storybook: pnpm run build:shared && cd packages/storybook && pnpm run storybook
scripts.storybook:build: pnpm run build:all && cd packages/storybook && pnpm run build-storybook
scripts.storybook:dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:shared" "cd packages/storybook && pnpm run storybook:dev"
scripts.fresh:install: pnpm run clean:simple && pnpm install && pnpm run build:shared
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/*/.turbo && pnpm store prune
